nodes.name: LLM: Web Search for Topics - Sonar Pro Search

parameters.content:
## 📝 Input Stage

Captures user keywords and desired article count through a web form trigger

## 🔍 Topic Generation

Uses web search to find trending content, then generates unique article topics with distinct angles based on keywords

## ✂️ Split & Process

Splits generated topics into individual items for parallel article generation

## ✍️ Article Writing

Performs web research for each topic, then generates comprehensive SEO-optimized articles (1000-1500 words) with embedded citations

## 💾 Storage

Saves completed articles with metadata (title, content, keywords, meta description) to Airtable

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "title": "The Future of AI in Content Marketing",
  "metaDescription": "Discover how artificial intelligence is revolutionizing content marketing strategies and what it means for businesses in 2024 and beyond.",
  "content": "In today's digital landscape, artificial intelligence is no longer a futuristic concept—it's a present reality transforming how businesses create and distribute content. From automated writing tools to predictive analytics, AI is reshaping the content marketing industry at an unprecedented pace.

According to [recent research from Gartner](https://www.gartner.com/ai-marketing), over 80% of marketing leaders are already using AI-powered tools in their content strategies, marking a significant shift in how organizations approach content creation and distribution.

## Understanding AI in Content Marketing

Artificial intelligence has become an integral part of modern content marketing strategies. Businesses are leveraging machine learning algorithms to analyze consumer behavior, predict trends, and create personalized content experiences.

The [Content Marketing Institute's 2024 report](https://contentmarketinginstitute.com/research) reveals that companies using AI-powered content tools have seen a 30% increase in engagement rates. This dramatic improvement stems from AI's ability to process vast amounts of data and identify patterns that human marketers might miss.

### Key AI Technologies

Natural Language Processing (NLP) enables machines to understand and generate human-like text. Machine learning algorithms analyze vast amounts of data to identify patterns and preferences. According to [MIT Technology Review](https://www.technologyreview.com/ai-nlp), these technologies work together to create more targeted and effective content strategies.

### Real-World Applications

Major brands like Netflix and Amazon have pioneered AI-driven personalization, resulting in [significant increases in user engagement](https://hbr.org/personalization-case-studies). Their success demonstrates the tangible benefits of AI integration in content delivery.

## Benefits of AI-Powered Content

The integration of AI in content creation offers numerous advantages. It increases efficiency by automating repetitive tasks, improves personalization through data analysis, and enhances content quality with intelligent suggestions.

Marketing teams can now focus on strategic thinking while AI handles the heavy lifting. [Research from McKinsey](https://www.mckinsey.com/ai-productivity) shows that AI can reduce content creation time by up to 50%, allowing teams to produce more high-quality content with the same resources.

## Conclusion

As we move forward, the role of AI in content marketing will only continue to grow. Businesses that embrace these technologies early will gain a competitive advantage in creating engaging, personalized content at scale.

The key is to find the right balance between AI automation and human creativity. While AI excels at data processing and pattern recognition, human creativity and strategic thinking remain irreplaceable. By combining both strengths, organizations can create truly exceptional content marketing strategies that drive results.",
  "keywords": "AI content marketing, artificial intelligence, content automation, machine learning, marketing technology"
}

parameters.text:
=STEP 1 - WEB RESEARCH:
Search the web for the latest information, statistics, and case studies about:

Title: {{ $json.title }}
Angle: {{ $json.angle }}
Keywords: {{ $('Form Trigger: Keyword Input').item.json.Keywords }}

Find high-quality sources (2024-2025) and CAPTURE THE URLs. You will need these specific URLs for the writing step.

STEP 2 - ARTICLE WRITING:
Write a comprehensive SEO article based on your research.

CRITICAL CITATION RULES (READ CAREFULLY):
1.  **NO BRACKETED NUMBERS:** You are strictly FORBIDDEN from using citation numbers like [1], [2], [3].
2.  **INLINE MARKDOWN LINKS:** Every time you cite a fact, stat, or company, you MUST embed the specific URL directly into the text using Markdown.
    -   ✅ CORRECT: "According to [Gartner](https://www.gartner.com/en/newsroom), AI adoption is rising..."
    -   ❌ WRONG: "According to Gartner [1], AI adoption is rising..."
    -   ❌ WRONG: "According to Gartner, AI adoption is rising."

CONTENT REQUIREMENTS:
- Length: 1000-1500 words
- Tone: Professional, authoritative, yet accessible
- Structure: Use ## for main sections and ### for subsections
- SEO: Naturally incorporate the keywords provided

OUTPUT FORMAT:
Return ONLY a valid JSON object. Do not include markdown code blocks (```json) or conversational text.

{
  "title": "The article title",
  "metaDescription": "SEO-optimized meta description",
  "content": "The full article text with ## Headings and [inline markdown links](https://example.com). Use \n for new lines.",
  "keywords": "keyword1, keyword2, keyword3"
}
